# cloudflare_zero_trust_list (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "cloudflare_zero_trust_list" "example_zero_trust_list" {
  account_id = "699d98642c564d2e855e9661899b7252"
  list_id = "f174e90a-fafe-4643-bbbc-4a0ed4fc8415"
}
```
